ComicInfo.Summary:
F@#$ING RIOT
Double-Sized Finale
The final issue of Robyn Hood: The Ongoing Series is here. Robyn and her friends take a final stand against the Cabal, but when the smoke clears, it seems that an even greater threat has risen.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Roberta Ingranata | 1 | | B | Cover B | Manuel Preitano | 2 | | C | Cover C | David Lorenzo | 3 |
Note: The digital edition (3/16/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Teams: Dark Horde,Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse,The Cabal
